Title: SALES
Notes: Broken - Uses FOUT, SPUT, FPUT so won't work with AtomMMC

Title: GRAPH
Notes: Broken - Uses FIN, SGET, FGET so won't work with AtomMMC

Title: Chess
Notes: Works  - Keys: [ ] history; X reset; moves e.g. A2 A4; R - let computer move.

Title: Database
Notes: Works  - slow to start; seems to be scanning all memory in basic and getting confused by 32K RAM.  If you have 32K RAM, *LOAD WINELIST 4000 will speed things up. Loads to command promt after a minute.

Title: Castle Quest
Notes: Works - but really set up for a Joystick Keys are: 3 - G Q (player 1) 2 , F P (player 2)
